thread.title: BRIEF-National Storage Affiliates Trust Says NSA Op & Co Entered Third Amendment And Release Of Parent Guaranty To Agreement, Dated May 6, 2016

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-National Storage Affiliates Trust Says NSA Op & Co Entered Third Amendment And Release Of Parent Guaranty To Agreement, Dated May 6, 2016

organizations.name: brief-national storage affiliates trust says nsa op & co

text:
April 20 (Reuters) - National Storage Affiliates Trust :
* NATIONAL STORAGE AFFILIATES TRUST -ON APRIL 16, NSA OP & CO ENTERED THIRD AMENDMENT AND RELEASE OF PARENT GUARANTY TO AGREEMENT, DATED MAY 6, 2016
* NATIONAL STORAGE AFFILIATES TRUST - AMENDMENT RELEASES CO FROM ITS GUARANTEE OF OBLIGATIONS OF OPERATING PARTNERSHIP UNDER KEYBANK CREDIT AGREEMENT
* NATIONAL STORAGE AFFILIATES TRUST - AMENDMENT PLACES RESTRICTIONS ON CO'S ABILITY TO INCUR ADDITIONAL INDEBTEDNESS, SUBJECT TO EXCEPTIONS - SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2K3kmon ] Further company coverage:
